ygData.subject: RE: Abit bout the guild thing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember the 1st Guk hunt?  U and CB gu niang died?  I die die also stay 2 hrs to help u guys, hehe. Sigh, that reminds my 1st encounter with Wylven, and join
ygData.messageBody:
Remember the 1st Guk hunt? U and CB gu niang died? I die die also stay 2
hrs to help u guys, hehe.

Sigh, that reminds my 1st encounter with Wylven, and join his guild for the
help he extended to us. He is a really a damn nice helpful chap, feel very
pai seh last night. Lucky got the bo-chap faceless ah-qua gu niang doing
most of the talking, hehe.



On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 5:13 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> heheh. I think when I send SOS, hard. likely at Sol B or Lower Guk.
>
> LKW wrote:
> >
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Ya ya, same opinion here. Helping my RL friend to tat extend is
personal
> > decision, he been my games kakis since paper AD&D, hmm, tat's 16 yrs
ago
> > (know him since kid time, neighbour, classmates, collegue, kakis,
hehe)?
> >
> > Anyway, when there is serious SOS msg, I will be helping also. :)
> >
> > p/s: Same thing applies for me ;) But generally speaking, if others
not
> > helpful, and when they seek SOS and I'm free, I still dun mind helping.
> > Just not to the extend tat I (or whole guild) must stop wat they are
doing
> > and rush to the player. With guildsay, it's not very difficult to see
who
> > is nearest and available to help ;) The purpose of forming our own
kakis
> > is to help as and when we can. Unlike QHD so many faces I never seen
b4,
> > if I can help, I help, if I'm not free, I won't bother also. But for
own
> > kakis guild, I presume is small group of pple we know in RL or EQ, and
have
> > trust with one another. Under this kinda situation, I'm more willing to
> > extend my help. If really no one online when a kakis SOS msg is send
out,
> > I die die camp for 10 hrs liao will also rush to help. That's all I
have
> > to say - all depending on situation ;) One good thing abt this lengthy
> > discussion is tat, by now I think all kakis know when to send a SOS msg
> > liao instead of abusing it ;)
> >
> > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 8:35 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > >
> > > well... then i suggest u guys state the guild guidelines properly...
then
> > > see how... becos i want a guild that whenever i need help (and i
> > seriously
> > > mean it) i wanna get some serious help... like i said... its not
gonna be
> > > abused... that kid thing is a fucked up story... but if serious help
is
> > > required ... someone must be there to help... that my minimum
> > > requirement.... if u just wanna have a guild for exploring then whats
the
> > > point? can always form group and explore what....
> > >
> > > no body ask u to help your RL friend to that extend what... its you
who
> > > wanna do that... i never say we MUST do that to all guild members...
all
> > > shoud learn how to survive... as a guild... we should also do stuff
> > like...
> > >
> > > GIVE HIM A FISH, FEED HIM A DAY
> > > TEACH HIM TO FISH, FEED HIM FOR LIFE.
> > >
> > > if u get what im trying to say... enough said...
> > >
> > > Nicademous
> > > The 'supposed' to be evil Necromancer
> > > p/s: i never ever forget how i was saved by Garren when i needed help
and
> > if
> > > he ever needs any (which is unlikely now, hehe), i'll do all i can
to
> > help
> > > him out.... its just the same, if i needed help and no one fuck care
bout
> > > helping me... then when im much higher level, u think i still wanna
help
> > out
> > > thesame folks? guess not...
> >
